character.name: Murasaka Azusa
character.description: Murasaka Azusa is http://anidb.net/ch81238 [Naho]`s classmate and one of her friends. She is cheerful and often argues with http://anidb.net/ch81240 [Saku]. She receives a letter claiming to be from her future self with many requests for her.

character.name: Chino Takako
character.description: Chino Takako is http://anidb.net/ch81238 [Naho]`s classmate and best friend. She is very protective of Naho and often defends her. She receives a letter claiming to be from her future self with many requests for her.

character.name: Takamiya Naho
character.description: Takamiya Naho is a high school student who receives a mysterious letter claiming to be from herself in the future. The letter concerns the transfer student http://anidb.net/ch81239 [Naruse Kakeru] and presents many demands, which she then tries to meet.

character.name: Naruse Kakeru
character.description: Naruse Kakeru is a transfer student from Tokyo. During the first day of classes, he gets invited to go out with http://anidb.net/ch81238 [Naho] and her friends, so he ditches his previous arrangement of taking his mother to the hospital.

character.name: Hagita Saku
character.description: Hagita Saku is http://anidb.net/ch81238 [Naho]`s classmate and one of her friends. He receives a letter claiming to be from his future self with many requests for him.

character.name: Suwa Hiroto
character.description: Suwa Hiroto is http://anidb.net/ch81238 [Naho]`s classmate and one of her friends. He receives a letter claiming to be from his future self with many requests for him.
